pageTitle: Your claim start date is more than 3 months ago

lateClaim.h1: Your claim start date is more than 3 months ago
lateClaim.p1:
You can only get New Style ESA for up to 3 months in the past, unless:

  • you or someone else has already told us you want to make a claim
  • your employer took more than 3 months to tell you youâ€™re not entitled to Statutory Sick Pay
lateClaim.p2: We may need to contact you.
